title: Tax credits for Ig most likely to promote growth

content.prompt: Which of the following is most likely to promote long-run economic growth?

choices.label: An increase in income taxes for middle-class households
An increase in tax credits for business spending on research and development

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
